FuncDef:
The depth command configures a sampling depth for the sampling path of a telemetry sensor.
The undo depth command restores the default configuration. The depth command configures a sampling depth for the sampling path of a telemetry sensor. The undo depth command restores the default configuration. The default sampling depth for the sampling path of a telemetry sensor is 1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a sampling depth.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 3.

ExtraInfo: After configuring a sampling path on a device, you can run the depth command to configure a sampling depth for the sampling path. The device collects data of some or all nodes in the path based on the sampling depth.
